story_teamrocket_03_01000/2401_1001_0200:
Well...we still have no idea when the next
Dynamax Pokémon will appear.
story_teamrocket_03_01000/2401_1001_0300:
We’ve got Gym Leaders spread out and waiting
just in case we have to jump in to help.
story_teamrocket_03_01000/2401_1001_0400:
But we can’t stop what’s causing all of these
problems until Lance and Silver’s group takes
down Giovanni.
story_teamrocket_03_01000/2401_1001_0500:
I hope they’re OK... It is Giovanni we’re
talking about.
story_teamrocket_03_01000/2401_1001_0600:
Yeah, and Silver doesn’t seem to be fond of
working in teams, either.
story_teamrocket_03_01000/2401_1001_0900:
What do you think? We got ourselves some
sygna suits!
story_teamrocket_03_01000/2401_1001_1000:
We also have new partner Pokémon, too! We’re
turning over a new leaf, so to speak!
story_teamrocket_03_01000/2401_1001_1100:
We’re counting on you, but remember—you’ll be
dealing with a very difficult opponent.
story_teamrocket_03_01000/2401_1001_1200:
Yeah, we know! But no matter what, we’re still
gonna go!
story_teamrocket_03_01000/2401_1001_1300: Because we want to help our friend!
story_teamrocket_03_01000/2401_1001_1400:
Yeah! And we won’t let Team Rocket get away
with anything here on Pasio!
